Package candle.bitcoin.explorer.esplora

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EsploraResponseCallback
    Callback interface used by EsploraClient to respond to requests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EsploraBlock
    The EsploraBlock object is a representation of the block data provided from the Esplora API.
    EsploraClient
    The EsploraClient helps requesting Bitcoin Blockchain data from an Esplora HTTP API endpoint.
    EsploraFormatter
    A util class to help with formatting EsploraBlock data as a human readable string.
